data.message: Hello I was contacted a woman who said she was told to friend me to tell me I am the winner of the sweepstakes. I am supposed to send money on Friday and then they will send my check. I am not sending anything. Do you want the information about her that I have ?

replies.message: Thanks for reaching out, Paul. It sounds like you've received a spam message. Please report this message as spam by following these tips listed in our Help Center: http://bit.ly/2916VXa. -Jessica
